description: You manipulate light to your advantage.
leveltext: You produce ambient light within a radius of {{rules|4 + floor(Level / 2)}}.
You may focus the light into a laser beam, temporarily reducing the radius of your ambient light by 1.
Ambient light recharges at a rate of 1 unit every 15 rounds until it reaches its maximum value.
{{rules|10 + 3 * Level}}% chance to reflect light-based damage
leveltext_ko: 빛을 집중시켜 레이저 빔을 발사할 수 있으며, 이 경우 주변광의 반경이 일시적으로 1 감소합니다.
빛 속성 피해를 반사할 확률 {{rules|10 + 3 * Level}}%
